User Banned (2 Months): Concern Trolling Xbox Threads; Long History and Numerous Bans for the Same

In general I find discussions about personnel on Era a bit ridiculous. We might have a feeling about what the very biggest and most influential people are like, e.g. Spencer, Ryan, or Kotick, but what do we know about the difference Alan Hartman made to Turn 10 or Forza? How can we possibly predict what this will mean for Xbox?

But in this particular case... eeeeh. The newest Forza Motorsport took six years and is possibly the buggiest first party game I've ever played. The most consistent problem with Microsoft's first party in the last decade is early, rough, shoddy releases. I would hope that an incoming head of Xbox Studios would be looking to buck that trend, so it's odd to see someone installed that arguably represents it.
